name: Lost in Transmission [GGJ18]
description:
A final frontier bound endless-runner where you control your space cruiser remotely from your command center.

But beware: the farther you go, the weaker the signal to your ship becomes. Soon, your inputs will see significant lag and you'll have to plan ahead as you weave through asteroids.

Controls:

  • Left and Right arrow keys to move

Power Ups:

  • Repair - Restore the ship one level
  • Amplifier - Reduce the lag time of commands
  • Light Speed - Become invincible as you go faster than any man has gone before
